trans-unit.source: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content.
trans-unit.target: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content.

trans-unit.source: In a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.
trans-unit.target: In a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.

trans-unit.source: Content design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
trans-unit.target: Content design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

trans-unit.source: Content design basics for UWP apps
trans-unit.target: Content design basics for UWP apps

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content: in a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.
trans-unit.target: The main purpose of any app is to provide access to content: in a photo-editing app, the photo is the content; in a travel app, maps and info about travel destinations is the content; and so on.

trans-unit.source: Navigation elements provide access to content; command elements enable the user to interact with content; content elements display the actual content.
trans-unit.target: Navigation elements provide access to content; command elements enable the user to interact with content; content elements display the actual content.

trans-unit.source: This article provides content design recommendations for the three content scenarios.
trans-unit.target: This article provides content design recommendations for the three content scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Design for the right content scenario
trans-unit.target: Design for the right content scenario

trans-unit.source: There are three main content scenarios:
trans-unit.target: There are three main content scenarios:

trans-unit.source: **Consumption**: A primarily one-way experience where content is consumed.
trans-unit.target: **Consumption**: A primarily one-way experience where content is consumed.

trans-unit.source: It includes tasks like reading, listening to music, watching videos, and photo and image viewing.
trans-unit.target: It includes tasks like reading, listening to music, watching videos, and photo and image viewing.

trans-unit.source: **Creation**: A primarily one-way experience where the focus is creating new content.
trans-unit.target: **Creation**: A primarily one-way experience where the focus is creating new content.

trans-unit.source: It can be broken down into making things from scratch, like shooting a photo or video, creating a new image in a painting app, or opening a fresh document.
trans-unit.target: It can be broken down into making things from scratch, like shooting a photo or video, creating a new image in a painting app, or opening a fresh document.

trans-unit.source: **Interactive**: A two-way content experience that includes consuming, creating, and revising content.
trans-unit.target: **Interactive**: A two-way content experience that includes consuming, creating, and revising content.

trans-unit.source: Consumption-focused apps
trans-unit.target: Consumption-focused apps

trans-unit.source: Content elements receive the highest priority in a consumption-focused app, followed by the [navigation elements](navigation-basics.md) needed to help users find the content they want.
trans-unit.target: Content elements receive the highest priority in a consumption-focused app, followed by the [navigation elements](navigation-basics.md) needed to help users find the content they want.

trans-unit.source: Examples of consumption-focused apps include movie players, reading apps, music apps, and photo viewers.
trans-unit.target: Examples of consumption-focused apps include movie players, reading apps, music apps, and photo viewers.

trans-unit.source: a newsreader app
trans-unit.target: a newsreader app

trans-unit.source: General recommendations for consumption-focused apps:
trans-unit.target: General recommendations for consumption-focused apps:

trans-unit.source: Consider creating dedicated [navigation](navigation-basics.md) pages and content-viewing pages, so that when users find the content they are looking for, they can view it on a dedicated page free of distractions.
trans-unit.target: Consider creating dedicated [navigation](navigation-basics.md) pages and content-viewing pages, so that when users find the content they are looking for, they can view it on a dedicated page free of distractions.

trans-unit.source: Consider creating a full-screen view option that expands the content to fill the entire screen and hides all other UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Consider creating a full-screen view option that expands the content to fill the entire screen and hides all other UI elements.

trans-unit.source: Creation-focused apps
trans-unit.target: Creation-focused apps

trans-unit.source: Content and [command](commanding-basics.md) elements are the most import UI elements in a creation-focused app: command elements enable the user to create new content.
trans-unit.target: Content and [command](commanding-basics.md) elements are the most import UI elements in a creation-focused app: command elements enable the user to create new content.

trans-unit.source: Examples include painting apps, photo editing apps, video editing apps, and word processing apps.
trans-unit.target: Examples include painting apps, photo editing apps, video editing apps, and word processing apps.

trans-unit.source: As an example, here's a design for a photo app that uses command bars to provide access to tools and photo manipulation options.
trans-unit.target: As an example, here's a design for a photo app that uses command bars to provide access to tools and photo manipulation options.

trans-unit.source: Because all the commands are in the command bar, the app can devote most of its screen space to its content, the photo being edited.
trans-unit.target: Because all the commands are in the command bar, the app can devote most of its screen space to its content, the photo being edited.

trans-unit.source: example of a photo editing app design that uses active canvas
trans-unit.target: example of a photo editing app design that uses active canvas

trans-unit.source: General recommendations for creation-focused apps:
trans-unit.target: General recommendations for creation-focused apps:

trans-unit.source: Minimize the use of [navigation](navigation-basics.md) elements.
trans-unit.target: Minimize the use of [navigation](navigation-basics.md) elements.

trans-unit.source: [Command](commanding-basics.md) elements are especially important in creation-focused apps.
trans-unit.target: [Command](commanding-basics.md) elements are especially important in creation-focused apps.

trans-unit.source: Since users will be executing a lot of commands, we recommend providing a command history/undo functionality.
trans-unit.target: Since users will be executing a lot of commands, we recommend providing a command history/undo functionality.

trans-unit.source: Apps with interactive content
trans-unit.target: Apps with interactive content

trans-unit.source: In an app with interactive content, users create, view, and edit content; many apps fit into this category.
trans-unit.target: In an app with interactive content, users create, view, and edit content; many apps fit into this category.

trans-unit.source: Examples of these types of apps include line of business apps, inventory management apps, cooking apps that enable the user to create or modify recipes.
trans-unit.target: Examples of these types of apps include line of business apps, inventory management apps, cooking apps that enable the user to create or modify recipes.

trans-unit.source: a design for a collaboration tool, an app that has interactive content
trans-unit.target: a design for a collaboration tool, an app that has interactive content

trans-unit.source: These sort of apps need to balance all three UI elements:
trans-unit.target: These sort of apps need to balance all three UI elements:

trans-unit.source: [Navigation](navigation-basics.md) elements help users find and view content.
trans-unit.target: [Navigation](navigation-basics.md) elements help users find and view content.

trans-unit.source: If viewing and finding content is the most important scenario, prioritize navigation elements, filtering and sorting, and search.
trans-unit.target: If viewing and finding content is the most important scenario, prioritize navigation elements, filtering and sorting, and search.

trans-unit.source: [Command](commanding-basics.md) elements let the user create, edit, and manipulate content.
trans-unit.target: [Command](commanding-basics.md) elements let the user create, edit, and manipulate content.

trans-unit.source: General recommendations for apps with interactive content:
trans-unit.target: General recommendations for apps with interactive content:

trans-unit.source: It can be difficult to balance navigation, content, and command elements when all three are important.
trans-unit.target: It can be difficult to balance navigation, content, and command elements when all three are important.

trans-unit.source: If possible, consider creating separate screens for browsing, creating, and editing content, or providing mode switches.
trans-unit.target: If possible, consider creating separate screens for browsing, creating, and editing content, or providing mode switches.

trans-unit.source: Commonly used content elements
trans-unit.target: Commonly used content elements

trans-unit.source: Here are some UI elements commonly used to display content.
trans-unit.target: Here are some UI elements commonly used to display content.

trans-unit.source: (For a complete list of UI elements, see [Controls and UI elements](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn611856).)
trans-unit.target: (For a complete list of UI elements, see [Controls and UI elements](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn611856).)

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: Category

trans-unit.source: Elements
trans-unit.target: Elements

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Audio and video
trans-unit.target: Audio and video

trans-unit.source: Media playback and transport controls
trans-unit.target: Media playback and transport controls

trans-unit.source: Plays audio and video.
trans-unit.target: Plays audio and video.

trans-unit.source: Image viewers
trans-unit.target: Image viewers

trans-unit.source: [Flip view](../controls-and-patterns/flipview.md), [image](../controls-and-patterns/images-imagebrushes.md)
trans-unit.target: [Flip view](../controls-and-patterns/flipview.md), [image](../controls-and-patterns/images-imagebrushes.md)

trans-unit.source: Displays images.
trans-unit.target: Displays images.

trans-unit.source: The flip view displays images in a collection, such as photos in an album or items in a product details page, one image at a time.
trans-unit.target: The flip view displays images in a collection, such as photos in an album or items in a product details page, one image at a time.

trans-unit.source: Lists
trans-unit.target: Lists

trans-unit.source: drop-down list, list box, list view and grid view
trans-unit.target: drop-down list, list box, list view and grid view

trans-unit.source: Presents items in an interactive list or a grid.
trans-unit.target: Presents items in an interactive list or a grid.

trans-unit.source: Use these elements to let users select a movie from a list of new releases or manage an inventory.
trans-unit.target: Use these elements to let users select a movie from a list of new releases or manage an inventory.

trans-unit.source: Text and text input
trans-unit.target: Text and text input

trans-unit.source: [Text block](../controls-and-patterns/text-block.md), [text box](../controls-and-patterns/text-box.md), [rich edit box](../controls-and-patterns/rich-edit-box.md)
trans-unit.target: [Text block](../controls-and-patterns/text-block.md), [text box](../controls-and-patterns/text-box.md), [rich edit box](../controls-and-patterns/rich-edit-box.md)

trans-unit.source: Displays text.
trans-unit.target: Displays text.

trans-unit.source: Some elements enable the user to edit text.
trans-unit.target: Some elements enable the user to edit text.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Text controls](../controls-and-patterns/text-controls.md)
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Text controls](../controls-and-patterns/text-controls.md)

trans-unit.source: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the [Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=258743).
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the [Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=258743).
